lines.text:
[singing]
Now, way down upon the Swanee River, / Folks keep jivin' all the day long; / 'Cause that's where I'm gonna stay forever / With a gate who'll make my life a song. / So honey chile, on that day, / When you come my way, / I'll say, "Thank Dixie for me!"
Convince a female? There ain't nobody livin' can tell 'em nothin'. Next to a sheep, they're the dumbest critters on earth.

[singing]
Come on along; / No other place will do. / You'll fall in love with Utah, / And Utah will love you.
Oh, I know that. But what're you up to?
